price: Aqueles cujas almas os anjos levam, enquanto benignos, dizendo: "Que a paz seja sobre vós! Entrai no Paraíso, pelo que fazíeis"
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ طَيِّبِينَ يَقُولُونَ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna tatawaffāhumu al-malāikatu ṭayyibīna yaqūlūna salāmun ʿalaykumu ud'khulū al-janata bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
